#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long


int main() {
	vector<int> v(8001);
	v[1]=5;
	int i,cal,t,n;
	for(i=2;i<=8000;i++)
	{
		cal=i/2;
		if(i%2)
			v[i]=v[cal]*5+5;
		else
			v[i]=v[cal]*5;
	}
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		printf("%d\n",v[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
